text: "Harden My Heart" is a 1981 song by American hard rock band Quarterflash and taken from their debut self-titled album. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 5 in Switzerland, number 6 in Australia, number 12 in New Zealand and number 15 in Austria. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads
title: Harden My Heart
